TopicTitle: Steam Awards - 2019 - The Labor of Love

Articles.Content:
It's only one category for all non-2019-released games, and ksp pretty fits there.
"This game, to this day, is still getting new content after all these years"
 

 

Give ksp some love after years of the labor of love: 
https://store.steampowered.com/steamawards/nominations
I think with the free quality of life improvements, the big switch to a new version of unity, and the new DLC(s) this award is well earned!
If there was something about the long standing community and thousands upon billions of hours modders have put into the game, there's not many other games that can compete.
